price: Wͻkaa sε: “Aberε a yεyε nnipa kuo a yεho yεden yi (na yɛantumi ammͻ neho ban) na pataku kye no we a εneε na εyε nokorε a ɛsi pi sε yεyε berεguofoͻ.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
